resources.string: This device doesn\'t support Camera2 API.
Use the style camera from the main menu to capture pics in your favorite style. \n To switch styles touch the screen, to capture a photo touch the white circle.
To upload new styles for us to build for you must be signed in using your google account. After you signed in you can choose between two option:
Send us a style direct from your camera using the same camera interface!
Send us a style from your gallery! \n If the feature does not work check the app\'s permissions.
The photos you took with the app are saved in a special folder called "styled photos" and can be found on the android storage folder.
For further support contact me at ofirsasson123@gmail.com.
